brief: Gets the content of an attribute as an int
name: getInt()
description: Returns an attribute value of the element as an int. If the defaultValue parameter is specified and the attribute doesn't exist, then defaultValue is returned. If no defaultValue is specified and the attribute doesn't exist, the value 0 is returned.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: the non-null full name of the attribute

parameters.name: defaultValue
parameters.description: the default value of the attribute
